title: The Heat go cold as the Celtics even the series
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss game 4 between the Celtics and the Heat. The Heat starters were ice cold to start the game breaking all kinds of records for poor play. The guys breakdown the epic loss, was it the poor Heat shooting or the return of Robert Williams? Find out their answer. Also, Rick Ross wants a stake in the Miami Heat. Jacoby wants this to happen because he likes a guy who has money that loves to spend money. Plus, was Aaron Judge drinking from a regular water bottle or a baby one? Don’t miss this convo as the guys talk about their gripes with this situation. Also, it’s NFL OTAs as players start to show up. Is it a big deal for certain players skipping or not a big deal? The guys discuss this and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
